tracks.text: Bandai Namco
Bandai Namco Filmworks
Kodansha
Clouds dot a sky over mountains. Near a road, crouched, leafy figures crawl forward.
Cubes float in blue streams of light.
The light eminates from a stone tablet.
Red and black text appears. Quality Assurance in Another World. The text becomes grainy and glitches.
Haga presses his hands against a stone wall.
He pulls out a pad of paper and writes.
Nikola carries boxes near a tent.
She trips, dropping papers. She gets up, dirt smudging her face.
A dog man sits at a desk. Papers with sketches hang on a nearby wall.
He presents the papers to a girl with short green hair, sitting in a bed.
A silver haired elf slices meat. She turns, holding plates of food.
Nikola floats in the stream of blue, glowing yellow.
Light passes over the Play-Ing Inc group, including Sakai and Sumida. A red haired man with a goatee stands alone.
A black knight with a green cape and broadsword walk through a barren land.
A small man sits in a glowing pod, surrounded by a nest of wires.
The small man transforms into Haga.
The dog man puts his hands on the ground and glows green.
Haga races past the glow, knife in hand.
A muscular, humanoid monster with tusks swipes at him. He leaps back, and the elf leaps over him, coming down with a broadsword.
She slices through the tusked monster's right arm.
A variety of monsters approach. Nikola stands alone, mouth open.
Blue light erupts, knocking back the monsters.
A dragon roars. The elf, dog man, Haga, and Nikola look up at it.
Haga tenses
Montage of character faces, including Haga's party. Nikola is consumed in flames. Haga reaches out into white light while screaming.
A platform sits in a rectangular pool in a dark stone room. A green diamond sits in a library. A king is flanked by a man and a rabbit woman.
Haga and party look at a village from a cliff. A tablet sits on a desk.
Text appears, Number 3, Tesla. In a tall castle with numerous towers, 5 men stand in front of a throne. A red haired man approaches.
The NPCs stand nervously
A bloody dart board hangs on a wall.
The redhead tosses an NPC at the dartboard.
Blood runs down the wall
Sakai throws an NPC. Blood splatters.
Haga and Nikola crawl in disguise.
A crumbling tower, surrounded by torches and crumbling obelisks.
Haga draws a bow and fires through the entrance
A goblin lies dead on stairs, an arrow in his head. Haga and Nikola pass it.
An arrow flies over head.
Haga throws a rock.
A humanoid archer with a dog head falls forward.
Haga grabs a potion and tosses it. In the shadows, a horned cyclops catches on fire and collapses.
Nikola gapes after Haga
She picks up a gold coin
She drops her staff while looking at a trail of coins.
She picks up coins and imagines giving them to Haga
In a dark, stone chamber sits a rectangular pool. In the center of the pool is a platform with an altar. The Coin Boys, child sized orbs with snarling faces, surround the altar.
Nikola sits up. A giant hand emerges from the pool and opens. In the palm is a face. The hand roars.
A staff flies through the air and hits the hand face between the eyes.
The hand forms a fist, just as Haga leaps and kicks at it.
The hand falls into the pool. Haga lands next to Nikola on the altar.
The hand swipes at them. Haga pulls Nikola to the ground. The hand knocks Coin Boys into the pool.
Haga leaps off a Coin Boy, onto the hand, and stabs it in the face.
He leaps off the hand, and grabs onto a nearby pillar at the edge of the pool. He looks back.
He leaps, and stabs the hand in the back, pushing it to the ground.
Haga uses the staff to push the Coin Boys into the pool.
They steam, melt, and sink.
Haga kicks the hand into the pool.
He returns her staff. She steps back and sits down.
Kuro is bent over, face, arms and legs stuck in the ground. His pants are down, and she sits on his bare butt.

Now Loading... The Advent Altar is a relic of old times. It is a labyrinth crawling with magical creatures from the continent as well as cultists. Only adventurers who do not value their lives go near it.

Now Loading... Fighters: People who study sword and shield techniques. Because there are no skill requirements to join, the Clayborne Island warrior's guild has the highest number of registered members.
Namiko, a female elf with short green hair, falls a few inches towards the water, then resets, then repeats, several times per second.
He flexes and admires his muscular body.
Haga frowns
Jin is the blue haired leader.
Nikola grabs his waist
She pats him down
Nikola glows yellow and floats off the ground. She rises to the top of a pillar.
Outside the Advent Altar, at sunset, a pot sits over a crackling fire. Glowing Nikola devours a sandwhich.
Tesla changes appearance
She bites on the stone.
She eats the stone
Tesla closes her eyes, glows brightly, and the glow disappears. Nikola opens her eyes, surprised.
The sun sets over their camp in front of the Advent Altar. During the day, Haga and Nikola walk down a road in the valley. His cheeks are hollow.
They turn around
A guard floats a foot off the ground. His arms are outstretched, parallel to the ground.
Haga and Nikola stare at the floating guard.
In a house on the edge of the village, a dog man sits at a desk in a dark room. By candlelight, he puts quill to parchment and smiles.
To be continued
Credits roll near stylized still drawings. Nikola carries a staff and walks ahead of Haga.
A dog man, Haga, and Nikola stand in a mountainous area. Haga and holds a paper and quill. Nikola holds the same and watches Haga. The dog man smiles.
The dog man sits, holding papers with colorful rectangles. Nikola and Haga stand at the far side of the room, near windows.
Haga, Nikola, the dog man, and a silver haired elf girl sit around a campfire, eating meat. The sun sets behind the woods surrounding them.
Nikola looks up, mouth open wide. A blue stream of light flickers and rises above her, shooting into the sky, until it explodes in fireworks.
Haga, Nikola, the dog man, and the silver haired elf girl stare at the night sky over mountains. Nikola points at the blue firework, sparkling above them.
Nikola floats in the air, glowing purple, and holding a wooden staff.
Haga, the dog man, and the silver haired elf stand in a lit, green grove. Nikola runs to them as the dog man waves.
